extendedInfo.description: Simple game of skill. It's all about agility. What's your highscore?- Hit the spits (the fishbony things) with the right color.- The main color is changing through every.- The game is getting continuously faster (spawn-time).- Gain bonus points for perfect spit hits in a row.- You can change the pipe color by clicking on it.- Gain extra points for dumping spits to the right colored pipe.Your feedback is very welcome directly to me via email to mail@burps-games.com.Have fun with the game ;-)Game made in Berlin, Germany
